text: Aŵala ŵakoposyedwe nsimangwao mwangali chilungamiko ni ikaŵeje ligongo lyanti ŵanganyao akutiji: “M’mbuje gwetu ni Allah.” Soni kungaŵaga Allah kwatuta ŵandu (amagongo) kupitila mwa ŵandu ŵane (mpela asilikali), gakagumulidwe masunagogi, yalichi, nyumba sine syakutendelamo ibada kwisa soni misikiti jalikolanjidwamo Lina lya Allah mwa winji, soni chisimu Allah chankamuchisye kusyene mundu jwaakunkamuchisya Jwalakwe (paajikamuchisya Dini Jakwe), chisimu Allah ni Jwakulimbangana nnope, Jwamachili gakupunda
